title: Web Music Player
description: Introducing my minimalist web music player! Built with HTML, CSS, and JS for seamless play, pause, and track navigation. Enjoy your favorite tunes on any device!

title: Face Detection App
description: Web face recognition app using FaceAPI and JavaScript! Detects faces in real-time, draws bounding boxes with age, gender, and emotion labels. Super fun project bringing face recognition to your browser!
